text: hey friends - curious what the timeline for launching the case study looks like?
hey, sorry im in sputnik land
tl;dr video is on hold.  we have good plans but need a pr person at google to approve our approach and our ability to shoot video (awaiting connect from josh.  josh has given us high level approval

tl;dr the written form of case study has a lead artifact of ‘ website inclusion’  justin working on draft but ooo til wednesday.  once he culls first draft, we have a slew of ideas for takedowns including blog posts, tweets, quotes.  dont wanna put it in front of the maint artifact though

we decided best day to shoot the video would be a week from today.  but looks highly unlikey.  ideally edit video by 9/12 (wald traveling after 9/12).  more info, here: <https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B2hvp3pmOYCFYUx5b1BjX2lDdms>

attachments.title: Meet Google Drive – One place for all your files
attachments.text: Google Drive is a free way to keep your files backed up and easy to reach from any phone, tablet, or computer. Start with 15GB of Google storage – free.
attachments.fallback: Meet Google Drive – One place for all your files

text: thanks for the updates, much appreciated!
